title: [Startup Global Program(12th)] Calls for applications! (By Jul. 14th)
author: KAIST창업원 판교센터 심해리
content:
Apply for the 12th Batch of the Startup Global Program
■ Qualification:
-Growth-stage startups with product in market and early revenue
– Industries: AI & Data Analysis, IoT & Smart Devices, Digital Health, CarTech, 5G Technology, Robotics, Smart Energy etc.
■ Deadline: 11:59 a.m. Jul. 14th, 2021 Taipei Time(GMT +8)
(We strongly suggest you complete this application form 3 days before the deadline so that our staff will still have time to inform you if the applying materials are insufficient.)
■ More information: Dropbox slides
■ Benefits from the 14-day program (Oct. 13th – 27th, 2021) :
– 1-on-1 meetings with decision-makers from leading corporations and key players in the global supply chain;
– Join the Open House Exhibition for the opportunities of the market development, investment, and manufacturing;
– Round-trip flight tickets subsidy and 14-day accommodation for 2 people.
**For startups in E-Mobility industry, you will have the chance to join “2035 E Mobility Global Demo Day” to pitch at the main stage of the exhibition.(Please find more details in P.20-26 of the deck)
Apply NOW! (Click)
